summary: Allows you to craft the Companions Wolf Armour
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=3]Name          : [/size][/color]Craftable Wolf Armour
[color=Red][size=3]Version       : [/size][/color]1.0
[color=Red][size=3]Date          : [/size][/color]28/10/12
[color=Red][size=3]Category      : [/size][/color]Armor
[color=Red][size=3]Author(s)     : [/size][/color]SoulLimit
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=Red][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
This mod makes it so you are able to craft Wolf Armour at a forge, which was previously not allowed in game.

[color=Red][size=4]Detail:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------[/color]
The materials required to craft each piece of Armour are listed below:

Boots:
1 Iron Ingot
2 Leather Strips
3 Steel Ingots

Cuirass:
1 Iron Ingot
3 Leather Strips
4 Steel Ingots

Gauntlets:
1 Iron Ingot
2 Leather Strips
2 Steel Ingots

Helmet:
1 Iron Ingot
2 Leather Strips
2 Steel Ingots

You must have the steel smithing perk before you can craft these items.

[color=Red][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
To install this mod manually you must download the archive, extract the esp from the archive and place it in your Skyrim/Data folder.


[color=Red][size=4]---Un-installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Un-installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
To do a manual un-installation just delete the esp from your Skyrim/Data folder


[color=Red][size=4]Known issues and bugs:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
No known issues or bugs

[color=Red][size=4] Incompatibilities:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------------[/color]
This mod will conflict with any mod that adds in crafting recipes for Wolf Armour.


[color=Red][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]
[url=http://www.win-rar.com/]WinRar[/url]

[color=Red][size=4]Recommended Mod:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3896]Wolf Armor Remix Male and Female [/url] by MonsterMonkey - A re-texture of the Wolf Armour, making it look much better.


[color=Red][size=4]Legal and licensing:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
First ask for my permission.
